titles.title: Restoring Truth and Sanity to American History Act
Restoring Truth and Sanity to American History Act
To codify Executive Order 14253 relating to restoring truth and sanity to American history, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
